alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hall (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 5:27PM CDT until August 18 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... Western Hall County in south central Nebraska... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 527 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Cairo, or 20 miles west of Grand Island, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wood River and Shelton. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 286 and 303. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings.
